response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. I understand its significance to you, valued at $1,500,000. My proposal is to offer this product to you at a price that reflects its true worth and allows us to collaborate harmoniously. I kindly suggest a purchase price of $1,200,000. This offer not only ensures a fair transaction but also leaves room for mutual benefits. I look forward to your positive consideration of this proposal. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 1200000}
